# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  bug988.cir bug988.cir.sh ydevices.cir ydevices.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug988.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ydevices.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug988.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug988.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vstar;valgrind")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug988.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug988.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/bug988.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vstar;valgrind")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/ydevices.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ydevices.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ydevices.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/ydevices.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_988_SON/ydevices.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;vstar")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
